word:
SA - A Solemn Appeal (1870)


Chap. 1 - Appeal to Mothers

     My Sisters: My apology for addressing you on this subject is, I am a mother, and feel alarmed for those children and youth who by solitary vice are ruining themselves for this world, and for that which is to come. Let us closely inquire into this subject from a physical, mental, and moral point of view.
